Text:
See you in London Jorn :)

In the meantime  "Don`t talk to Stranger"

The great Ronnie James Dio lives on! Can't wait to listen to this...
good thing he didn't overlook 'Straight Through the Heart.'

I'm inclined to agree with Wendy Dio and say that this is a fucking disgraceful cash in attempt. I love it how Jorn tries to defend himself by saying that this album has been in the works since late last year.
I'm not suggesting that people don't download it, but for fuck sakes don't give this tool any of your money.
